alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 7:08PM CDT until April 10 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Webb County in south central Texas... South central La Salle County in south central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Callaghan, or near Encinal, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Encinal, Fort Ewell Site and Callaghan. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 26 and 38. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
